imports:
import ButtonGroup from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/ButtonGroup";
import ButtonLink from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/ButtonLink";
example:
() => (
  <ButtonGroup>
    <ButtonLink
      external
      href="https://www.kiwi.com/en/search/results/london-united-kingdom/paris-france/anytime/anytime?bags=1.0&transport=aircraft"
    >
      Check flights
    </ButtonLink>
    <ButtonLink
      external
      href="https://www.kiwi.com/en/search/results/london-united-kingdom/paris-france/anytime/anytime?bags=1.0&transport=bus"
    >
      Check buses
    </ButtonLink>
  </ButtonGroup>
)

info.title: Button group with button links
info.description: Button groups can join together less important actions as button links.
